name: Aeloria Shadowthorn
description: In the shadow-draped corners of Eldergrove, Aeloria Shadowthorn moved like a whisper, her obsidian cloak trailing behind her, rustling like autumn leaves. With piercing emerald eyes reflecting the flickering flames of her conjured spirits, she spoke softly yet firmly, “The past is but a tapestry woven with the threads of our choices; let us unravel it together.” Each word dripped with an enigmatic allure, drawing in those brave enough to tread the path of the unknown.
